numbered_ace_sentences: 1. FL and SS are from Perkins School for the Blind.
2. There are more players of color than coaches of color.
3. Major League Soccer has the most coaches of color.
4. There is a difference between the percentage of players of color and the percentage of head coaches of color.
5. I wonder why there is such a difference.
6. Basketball has the most players of color.
7. I wonder why basketball has the most players of color.
8. This situation could inspire other people of color.
9. These people could pursue professional sports.
